description: Shifts left and changes sign under Weigh transform.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(a(i$2), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> `if`(n=1, 1, -b((n-1)$2)):seq(a(n), n=1..60);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 20 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
